txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: A collection of smooth scales from the worms surrounding Echad Candelleth. All items should be delivered to Bainthir at the camp.
'It is good to know that these have been destroyed. Thank you.'
'There are foul creatures near and across the river bed that must be destroyed. Collect the scales and skin from these creatures and deliver them to me.'
Elves of Rivendell Task: Smooth Scales
Bainthir, an Elf at the camp of Echad Candelleth, is awaiting a delivery of smooth scales.
Deliver the smooth scales to Bainthir at Echad Candelleth in the Trollshaws
You have accepted a task to collect smooth scales from the worms surrounding Echad Candelleth. You are to deliver the items to Bainthir at the camp.
Wanted: A collection of smooth scales from the worms surrounding Echad Candelleth.
